question: In "Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire," who is revealed to be the true identity of Mad-Eye Moody?
what magical device does Hermione uses to attend multiple classes simultaneously?
Which of the following Hogwarts houses values traits such as bravery, courage, chivalry, and daring?
Which magical creature is known for its ability to transform into a person's worst fear?
What is the primary ingredient in Polyjuice Potion that allows the drinker to temporarily assume the physical appearance of someone else?
In "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince," what is the significance of the locket that Dumbledore and Harry retrieve from the cave?
What is the name of the mysterious and magical object that becomes the central focus of the trio's quest to defeat Voldemort?
What is the significance of the "Mirror of Erised" and what does it show to those who look into it?
choice1: It shows the future, revealing the destiny of the person
choice2: It reflects the deepest desires of the heart
choice3: It reveals hidden truths about the person's past
choice4: It shows a distorted version of reality

question: What is the prophecy concerning Harry and Voldemort that is revealed in the Department of Mysteries?
choice1: Neither can live while the other survives
choice2: They are destined to be eternal enemies
choice4: Harry is the true heir of Slytherin

question: What is the Unforgivable Curse that causes intense pain to the victim without causing any physical harm?
What is the name of the magical object that Dumbledore uses to retrieve and view memories?
In "Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix," what is the prophecy that is revealed in the Hall of Prophecy at the Department of Mysteries?
choice1: The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches...
choice2: The chosen one will defeat Voldemort using the Elder Wand...
choice3: The Ministry of Magic will fall unless Voldemort is defeated...
choice4: The true heir of Slytherin will rise to power...

question: The real identity of the Half-Blood Prince?
Who is named Minister of Magic after the Battle of Hogwarts?
What is the name of the magical creature that Hagrid introduces to the Care of Magical Creatures class in "Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?"
What is the name of the spell used to summon objects to the caster's location?
What is the incantation for openning the Marauder's Map?
choice3: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good

question: What is the name of the village near Hogwarts where students often visit to buy supplies and enjoy some leisure time?
'Take a bath, and - er - take the egg with you, and - er - just mull things over in the hot water. It'll help you think... trust me.'
'Silly girl ... But Madam Pomfrey fixed her nose back on in the end.'
'Oh, please... I don't think Expelliarmus is exactly going to help us against You-Know-Who, do you?'
'My dad's Muggle-born and he's a right old slob. I suppose it varies, just as it does with wizards?'
'So - is it really true? You make a stag Patronus?'
'My philosophy is that worrying means you suffer twice.'
Mrs Weasley gave Ron the same colour jumper every year, what was it?
Who did Hermione knit lots of hats for?
choice3: The new first-years when she was a Prefect

question: Lucius Malfoy: 'Dear me, what's the use of being ______ the name of wizard if they don't even pay you well for it?'
Complete this quote from Harry's first Hallowe'en feast: '______- in the dungeons - thought you ought to know.'
'Well, this Hallowe'en will be my five hundredth deathday'
'But Winky didn't know that I was growing stronger. I was starting to fight my father's______'
Bellatrix Lestrange: '______?... Why, I have had the pleasure of meeting your parents, boy.'
In Harry's first Quidditch match, what happened after everyone realised Harry's broom was jinxed?
choice1: Hermione set Snape's robes on fire
choice2: Hagrid went to get Madam Hooch

question: During Harry's first Quidditch match in his third year, what happened to cause Harry to fall from his broom?
choice2: A rogue Bludger to the head
choice4: The heavy rain made Harry slip

question: After Draco Malfoy was revealed as the new Quidditch Seeker for the Slytherin team, what did Draco reveal his father had bought the whole squad?
choice1: Brand new Nimbus Two Thousand and Ones
